member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TracingAdapter._interceptors
member.summary: The collection of tracing interceptors to notify.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TracingAdapter._threadSafeInterceptors
member.summary: A read-only, thread-safe collection of tracing interceptors. Since List is only thread-safe for reads (and adding/removing tracing interceptors isn't a very common operation), we simply replace the entire collection of interceptors so any enumeration of the list in progress on a different thread will not be affected by the change.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TracingAdapter._lock
member.summary: Lock used to synchronize mutation of the tracing interceptors.

member.summary: Remove a tracing interceptor from change notifications.
member.returns: True if the tracing interceptor was found and removed; false otherwise.

member.summary: Returns true if status code in HttpRequestExceptionWithStatus exception is greater than or equal to 500 and not NotImplemented (501) or HttpVersionNotSupported (505).
member.returns: True if exception is transient otherwise false.

member.name: T:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.ExponentialBackoff
member.summary: A retry strategy with backoff parameters for calculating the exponential delay between retries.

member.name: T:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy
member.summary: Represents a retry strategy that determines the number of retry attempts and the interval between retries.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultClientRetryCount
member.summary: Represents the default number of retry attempts.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultClientBackoff
member.summary: Represents the default amount of time used when calculating a random delta in the exponential delay between retries.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultMaxBackoff
member.summary: Represents the default maximum amount of time used when calculating the exponential delay between retries.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultMinBackoff
member.summary: Represents the default minimum amount of time used when calculating the exponential delay between retries.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultRetryInterval
member.summary: Represents the default interval between retries.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultRetryIncrement
member.summary: Represents the default time increment between retry attempts in the progressive delay policy.

member.name: F:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultFirstFastRetry
member.summary: Represents the default flag indicating whether the first retry attempt will be made immediately, whereas subsequent retries will remain subject to the retry interval.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the retry strategy.
true to immediately retry in the first attempt; otherwise, false. The subsequent retries will remain subject to the configured retry interval.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.GetShouldRetry
member.summary: Returns the corresponding ShouldRetry delegate.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.NoRetry
member.summary: Returns a default policy that performs no retries, but invokes the action only once.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultFixed
member.summary: Returns a default policy that implements a fixed retry interval configured with the and parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultProgressive
member.summary: Returns a default policy that implements a progressive retry interval configured with the , , and parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy.DefaultExponential

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAction(System.Action)
member.summary: Repetitively executes the specified action while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.param: A delegate that represents the executable action that doesn't return any results.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAction``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Repetitively executes the specified action while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.typeparam: The type of result expected from the executable action.
member.param: A delegate that represents the executable action that returns the result of type .

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAsync(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Repetitively executes the specified asynchronous task while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.param: A function that returns a started task (also known as "hot" task).
member.returns: A task that will run to completion if the original task completes successfully (either the first time or after retrying transient failures). If the task fails with a non-transient error or the retry limit is reached, the returned task will transition to a faulted state and the exception must be observed.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAsync(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Repetitively executes the specified asynchronous task while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.param: A function that returns a started task (also known as "hot" task).
The token used to cancel the retry operation. This token does not cancel the execution of the asynchronous task.
member.returns: Returns a task that will run to completion if the original task completes successfully (either the first time or after retrying transient failures). If the task fails with a non-transient error or the retry limit is reached, the returned task will transition to a faulted state and the exception must be observed.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAsync``1(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}})
member.summary: Repeatedly executes the specified asynchronous task while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.param: A function that returns a started task (also known as "hot" task).
member.returns: Returns a task that will run to completion if the original task completes successfully (either the first time or after retrying transient failures). If the task fails with a non-transient error or the retry limit is reached, the returned task will transition to a faulted state and the exception must be observed.

member.name: M:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.ExecuteAsync``1(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Repeatedly executes the specified asynchronous task while it satisfies the current retry policy.
member.param: A function that returns a started task (also known as "hot" task).
The token used to cancel the retry operation. This token does not cancel the execution of the asynchronous task.
member.returns: Returns a task that will run to completion if the original task completes successfully (either the first time or after retrying transient failures). If the task fails with a non-transient error or the retry limit is reached, the returned task will transition to a faulted state and the exception must be observed.

The delay that indicates how long the current thread will be suspended before the next iteration is invoked.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.NoRetry
member.summary: Returns a default policy that performs no retries, but invokes the action only once.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.DefaultFixed
member.summary: Returns a default policy that implements a fixed retry interval configured with the default retry strategy. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

member.summary: Returns a default policy that implements a progressive retry interval configured with the default retry strategy. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

member.name: P:Hyak.Common.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy.DefaultExponential
member.summary: Returns a default policy that implements a random exponential retry interval configured with the default retry strategy. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.
